item.title: Digital Pharmacy
item.description: Challenge The current process of ordering your medications for the first time is really complicated. Project Goal Create the easiest way to submit a prescription for chronically ill people with permanent medication. Process Team We worked together in an interdisciplinary team with one Business Design Architect (BDA), Service Designer, UX Architect (me) and Strategist on our site and a Product Owner, Business Analyst and Customer Experience Manager on the client’s site.
